ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 71
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve always taken the phrase, ...The extra Metal Rod gives it a good shell while the bottle and metal twine hold and amplify the vision... as meaning the
ygData.messageBody:
I've always taken the phrase, "...The extra Metal Rod gives it a good shell
while the bottle and metal twine hold and amplify the vision..." as meaning
the collapsable pole is to flimsy to support the weight of the bottle,
reflective sharde etc...

On a more positive note, I got feedback from GZ that he passed my tinkering
petition on to the trade skills people. There where over 450 signatures on
it, maybe that will help some things.

Pahbi


At 07:17 AM 9/3/99 -0000, you wrote:

> 1. Some thought on the fishing pole
> From: makaspro@...
> 2. Re: Some thought on the fishing pole
> From: "RiceBall (A.K.A. Louie)" <riceball@...>

>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>
>Message: 1
> Date: 2 Sep 1999 12:52:25 -0000
> From: makaspro@...
>Subject: Some thought on the fishing pole
>
>During the beta, the developer for the trade skils said that
>for Tinkering it was VERY IMPORTANT to read between the lines
>in the Journals of Gimblestan. If that's a given lets look
>at the description of the Spyglass.
>
>"...The extra Metal Rod gives it a good shell while the bottle and
>metal twine hold and amplify the vision..."
>
>I've taken this to mean that because it says extra the collapsable
>pole must have at least 1 metal rod. I'm also assuming since it
>doesn't say extra or additional on the metal twine or bottle that
>they probably aren't a component.
>
>Of course I may be way off base. As soon as I have more money
>to experiment with I'm going to start trying to make this one.
>
>Kizik Fiddleton
>Fennin Ro Wizard
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>
>Message: 2
> Date: Thu, 2 Sep 1999 11:38:21 -0500
> From: "RiceBall (A.K.A. Louie)" <riceball@...>
>Subject: Re: Some thought on the fishing pole
>
>i dont think thats for the pole at all. Why would it say anything about
>vision if it was. That might be for glasses of some sort or something. I've
>never even tinkered (im not even a gnome :), but "vision" has nothing to do
>with fishing poles.
>-----Original Message-----
>From: makaspro@... <makaspro@...>
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
